mods.abstract: Inquires about reserved seat \close enough to hear what is going on\.

mods.note: 1018 A3 US 30 BlueGreenville SC 1004a5SK Hicks atty Dayton Tn.Being friend & admirer of Mr. Bryan is there any chance of me being assured of reserved seat close enough to hear what is going on during monkey trail ans D.B. Traxler
